1.content:
GS-4 Luke the 4449 walked home from the final line stadium. Their team one again 74/68 overtime despite BOOTES the big boy breaking his knee cap and shattering his pelvic spot, Luke subbed for his best friend. Luke was the starting QB for OSU. He just came home to hear his mother talking to someone at the table while standing in the doorway. Luke's mom's name is Renee and boy does everyone love her. She works for the pentagon and is president of sector 59.

Renee: all righty then you'll sleep with my oldest Luke, personally I think you two..."
Luke: ( clears cough) Hey mom we won state for the season.( looks over his moms shoulder and freaks out) MOM WHAT IS THAT THING DOING HERE AND WHY IS IT IN THIS HOUSE!" Pointing to the figure on the table top.
Renee: Luke this is Chaz, I took him in after agreed to live with you, me and you 2 sisters. Speaking of which were are they?"
Chaz: I hate to talk right now but two black and silver steamer ran by half and hour ago the the left."
Renee: thank you Chaz, Luke can you go get your sisters will I help Chaz to your room."
Luke: NO WAY IN HELL IS HE STAYING WITH ME IN MY ROOM. HELL NO! But I will go get Ashley and Alyssa."

Luke walked out of the airport size kitchen to his sisters room but found it empty.

Luke: wha.. Maybe their in the game room?"

In the kitchen

Renee: sorry bout Luke behavior, since his dad died in a truck accident, he hates anyone new."
Chaz: I see. I used to be that way cause of my 2 little brothers. They always lied bout me and get me in trouble with everyone, can't ever leave home without being attacked."

Renee felt bad for him.

With Luke in casino sized game room.

Luke: Ashley, Alyssa mom wants you now! Where are they?"

Luke looked around till he came into the movie and game room with the T.V. on and his two sisters asleep in NASCAR style chairs.
1.title: O no

11.content:
Luke looked at the two sleeping engine and sighed ' great now mom wants too take care of a rat sized pest and he will be in MY ROOM HELL NO!', thought Luke as he left the game room. Quickly thinking what he said in his head, maybe this won't be so bad after all. He thought. He saw his mom carry human sized boxes in one hand while going to his room. Renee saw him and he had a blank stare on his face.

Luke: hey mom Ashley and Alyssa are sleeping in the game room again. Where Chaz?" Asking in an angry tone
Renee: well,( with an angry tone) you scared Chaz bad so he's in the living room with his iPod. You scared him and you didn't even talk or say hi to him. He's on the couch, you need to apologize for your behavior or no more football of any kind! Understand Luke Pacific? Serious face Luke."
Luke: yes mom." Softly he took off his gear and changed into a sleeveles shirt and wind pants with boot. Holding two A&W Rootbeers, both with straws. Luke stop in the door way and looked down then sigh, he scared this kid in his armor would be scare him again just by looking at him. He slowly moved to the room and put one rootbeer down by Chaz and keeped one for himself. He sat down on the couch and turned on the tv to Cartoon Network total drama island.

Luke: umm hello." Looking at the rootbeer then relishing the that Chaz's voice won't be as load as everyone's, he increased audio volume high to here him. Chaz hid behind the can when he scene Luke sit next to him.
Chaz: uh H..Hi you must be Luke. R right." Luke shook his head up and down slowly in a yes form.
Luke: yeah your Chaz right?"
Chaz: yes."

For an hour or so the giant and human talked bout different things and it seamed their premature with what they said bout each other.

Chaz: football champion eh?" Now happy to even sit on Luke's waist " ever heard of triple charge?"
Luke: No."
Chaz: well you have hole 1-3-7 spreed so the other can..."

But before Chaz could finish, Renee walded in with a small and large plate of steak firies and broccoli with melted butter.

Luke: thanks mom!"
Chaz:( now smiling hoping it way just like home) thank miss Pacific."
Renee: please call me Renee." Talking in a sweet tone. " Dig in !"
11.title: Walk away slowly

111.content:
Just as the three were about to eat, Luke heard running from the hallway. O-o reliving the steaks may have attacked his sisters, he quickly moved Chaz and his food of his waist and onto the coffee table he rushed in and grabs holds of his sisters before they get anymore closesr. Landing on his back. Luke got up and caried his sisters by their neck cables and airlanes. They flaired their arms and legs begging Luke to let the go but to no advail. They gave in and sigh. Luke walked over to Renee's couch and sat them beside their mom.

Renee: thanks Luke ( then she turned to he two daughters) now we have a gets here so don't hurt him or Luke will kill you two. O.K.?"
Both: OK."
Renee: good now (0-0) where's Luke and Chaz?"

Ashley and Alyssa look around but neather or their plates were their.

Ashley: they bailed."
Alyssa: maybe they went for seconds?"

Renee shook her head. Thinking Chaz probly freaked out Luke to him to his room to relax. And she was right but not bout freaking out. Luke his his should plate when her hit his back on the ground. Both daughters found Luke getting mended by Chaz and a welder for smaller size workers.

Luke: uhhhhh, kidg gag unnnn."
Chaz:( moves mask from face then back down) alright just one more pass and you be done alright?"
Luke: ie) alright ( trying to hold back his tears)

Chaz did one last pass just as Renee's hand came down and held him still while she sat on the foot of his bed.

Renee: I didn't know you could do THAT!"
Chaz: ( sigh ) back on earth I was an autobody student an Buckeye Carree Center. But since earth is gone..."
Renee: it's ok Chaz. How do you fell Luke?"
Luke: Like getting hit by a big boy x40."

Chaz looked at Luke then seen something out of the coner of his eye. A steam steal frame that looked like Luke's body. Renee looked over then something came into plan. Grabbing Chaz fast she had a devils smile as she move Chaz to the frame then placed him on the work bench. Grabbing the frames chest plate, the inside was covered in spiders webs and dust.

Renee: Luke didn't you say 12 years ago that this was not working cause of the power sorce."
Luke: yah, why ask now when we all..."
Renee can you change this to a human cockpit?"
Luke: ( looks up from the pillow) made if I get more steal and iron. Oh OH you want Chaz part of the family don't you mom?"
Renee: yes"
111.title: Income the sisters - O (bleep)

1111.content:
Luke went outside to the Bone yard to find some Sheets of Steel to make a Control Cockpit in the Winter Suit u no longer needs. Renee went to Check on Chaz whos more than confused then Worried.

Chaz : Renee?
Renee : yes sweety? ( she sits Chaz on her right thigh and he looks up at her giant boobs at-least trying to see her face )
Chaz : why are u guys doing this ?
Renee : well 2 reasons i have to go back to the Pentagon in a week and i know u did school once but you need to do it again just to Bland in with the Crowd
Chaz : did school then BCC to avoid a Headache full of Problems

Luke comes back wih his Stuff and just as he is bout to begin the doorbell rings )

???? : luke u home yet u left ur bag in my truck
Luke : oh oots

( he goes to get it and drags oots in )

Oots : OWW ear ear ear ( he's dragged upstairs )

Luke : oots u remember History Class bout the Humans right
oots : yeah why
luke : wanna meet one in train?
oots : luke are u cra....
chaz : hey their

oots shudders and the Union pacific Big boy Falls over out cold. Chaz sweet Drops.

Chaz : is this going to be a everyday thing now?
luke : no it wont be once the suit is finished ( hes taking the chest plate off to gut out the system and welds in a control box and wires it while chaz takes a pencil to poke the big boy till he wakes up )
Renee : that was funny abit the biggest engine falls over cause he say a little human ( chaz Growls ) sorry ( she Sheepish Smiles )

Chaz still poking Oots Face finally gets him away after a hour )

chaz ; bout time
Luke : yeah been out for a hour
oots : humans real ( he stares at the ceiling )
Chaz : hes brain dead now

Luke shrugs and Picks up Chaz and sets him in the Suit )

Luke : ok ever used a Excavator on ur Planet
Chaz : nope
luke : well its easy left-stick to Walk and turn, right stick is to control ur speed
chaz : wait if im here then how will i take a shit?
Luke : same as u always do
chaz : if im in the Suit ?
Luke : oh
Renee : and how will he eat too Luke he cant pass threw a line and get a drink and not eat
Luke : ugh shit
Oots : he could eat in the Cockpit in silent till the Crowd gets use to him here
Chaz : inst their a free-mode to use if i need to write or something
Luke : yeah that pad right their it drops a Headset and Helmet when u sit down at a desk or table and u wear the Gloves to Control the hands

( insert Free and Easy Down the Road I Go by Dierks Bentely song )

Luke : try Free mode (

Chaz trys it and Grips Lukes Neck Hard and Lets go ) thats good ( fall on his bed )
Luke : yeah ill say
Chaz : wait im still the Same Loco as u how will i pass on as a new Student with the same number and looks like u ?
Luke : whats ur Favorite Flag ?
Chaz : the Southern Dixie Flag why

Luke Paints it on the Suits Right arm and Takes off the Number Plate and on the Cab too )

Chaz :ugh? is this Normal Renee ?
Renee : on short terms yes for football and swimming yes
Chaz : oh boy kill me

Renee and the Others laugh but Chaz feels like school Come monday will end in disaster. the Next monday Chaz sits in Lukes Truck a 1994 Chevy Silverado 3500 Dully long bed Ext Cab )

Luke : nerves ?
chaz : yes and no No cause this is Ohio and the School is New Philadelphia High school if its the Same as the Earths School then i Know all the Twist and turns to the Building and yes cause its a new Experience in a train body instead of my regular body
luke : ull be fine
Chaz : i dought that already Luke ( luke Sighs )
Luke : listen just dont say much and u will be fine

Chaz doesnt Speek and Luke pulls in the Parking Lot at the School )

Chaz : yep to much like my old school
Luke : so this isnt a Problem getting around right
Chaz : no Wait dont i have to go with u to the Guidens Conslure to get a schedule ?
Luke : yep

Chaz remains Silent again as both Human and Locomotive walk inside and chaz Snarells )

Chaz : to much like my Home school airs thick and it reacks of Hatred and evil
Luke : how can u tell
Chaz : looks around and Whispers in lukes ears ) its a human thing the Nose gets tight and ears ring Slightly
Luke : ahhh makes scence ( he takes me to the Concleres office )

Challenger 3900 : ahh Luke How are u oh whos ur New Friend
Luke : sir can we talk in pRivet with my Friend here please
3900 : of Corse lock the Door please ( luke does so and Sits down as the UP engine Loks at the 2 ) so what is it u need to talk bout
luke : its my new Friend i think its best u scene for urself ( chaz Looks at look with a death Glare )
3900 : young man what does he mea.... ( chaz Opens the Chest Plate and Walks out on the CHest plate as it held open by Chains )
Chaz : sir ( salutes )
3900 : all be damned a real human Nice to meet you young man arnt u to old for this
Chaz : yes but Renee said i had to do this to get use to being a engine student
3900 : ahh Renee the Pentigon Agent yes that makes scene
luke : u see why behind Closed Doors
3900 : ah yes well heres what i can do ill give u the Same Schedule as Luke will that be ok ugh whats ur name young man ?
Chaz : Chaz Huprich
3900 : u have a Nickname theirs some other Chaz's here
Chaz : im usally Silverado aftermy Favorite Truck Brand By Chevrolet
3900 : Creative nickname ill write that as ur last name so u can move around
chaz : ok i guess

( he hands me the Paper and i look surprised Financial math 4 cool and American History Best Classes ever )

3900 : ifu feel uncoffterable around their engines please come see me Chaz ill help and so will luke
Chaz : yes sir ( smiles and Salutes and so does 3900 )

We both Leave and Head to the First Class with passes History and the Teacher is a SP 4-6-2 Engine the 2467 Jimmy

Jimmy : you ive never scene u here before whats ur name
Chaz : chaz Silverado Sir ( shows him the Paper and Pass )
jimmy : ok sit in the back by Luke
1111.title: Worked with Problems

info.brief_description: Steam trains moved from earth to a new planet.
info.description:
Luke the GS-4 4449 was walking home from a football game, then notice his mom talking to a 'human'

Luke: o boy":(
